Pipeline to preparing basket and payment instruments before proceed to PayPal
Handling for payment action. Should be called from a payment procssor pipeline
Entry Point for the Express Checkout from cart by using Customer Billing Agreemend ID. Should be linked from template.
Shipping Address Form for setting shipping address for Basket
Redirect user to PayPal
This pipeline must be called to authorize/capture transaction. It should be called from payment processor pipeline
Authorize payment after 'Order' transaction type, if proper option is enable
Continue order placing flow on site genesis site
Handles Paypal errors
Redirect user back to PayPal in case of 10486 error
Checks if Billing agreement id is actived. Responses Billing agreement Data
Saves state of "Use billing agreement checkbox"

Determines an existing basket from the current session. If a basket wasn't found, the pipeline ends in a named end node "error". This node can be used in other pipelines such as the checkout pipelines in order to access the basket. This pipeline does not create a new basket. Calling pipelines are responsible to properly react on the "error" end node.
Continue order placing flow on site genesis site
Set pipeline name for jumpnode, and remove variable PaypalCheckoutFromCart

Create data for GetExpressCheckout API call, do it and handle the result
Create data for DoExpressCheckout API call, do it and save transaction result
Create data for DoDirectPayment API call, do it and save transaction result
Pipeline for transactions search using TransactionSearch API call
Create data for DoDIrectPayment API call, do it and save transaction result
Pipeline to get details about single transaction using transaction ID
Pipeline to capture funds from 'Authorize' or 'Order' payment transaction
Pipeline to reauthorizes an existing authorization transaction
Pipeline to void an order or an authorization.
Pipeline to captures an authorized payment
Pipeline to process payment from buyers who have a current billing agreement with the merchant
Call any PayPal API method by name and method parameters
